Summary Note:
Bertrand Fournier Dupont and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Paris. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Bertrand Fournier Dupont is a seasoned professional with over 20 years of experience.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Bertrand Fournier Dupont and Gabrielle have been married since 2015. They are proud parents of 2 children: Colombe and Clémentine.
Education Background:
Bertrand completed his secondary education at Lycée Paul Valéry in 1988.
Bertrand received his degree from EMIC de Nice in 2004.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 20 years, Bertrand Fournier Dupont brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Bertrand Fournier Dupont launched his career as a Investment Banker at Société Générale S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2005 to 2010.
At Crédit Agricole S.A., he held the position of Private Equity Investor from 2010 to 2012, making significant contributions to the organization.
In 2012, he joined BNP Paribas S.A. as a Hedge Fund Manager, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped him grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 320000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Paris and Le Havre, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited 2830000 EUR from his father, a well-known Neurosurgeon, in 2009, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
